description.value:
An Aspis technician carries the following infused items: 2 lesser antidotes, 2 moderate acid flasks,2 moderate alchemist’s fires, and 2 lesser elixirs of life.
These items last for 24 hours or until the next time the technician makes their daily preparations.

Saving Throw DC 21 Fortitude;
Maximum Duration 6 rounds;
Stage 1 [[/r 1d10 # poison]] poison damage and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} (1 round);
Stage 2 [[/r 1d12 # poison]] poison damage, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} 1, and flat-footed (1 round);
Stage 3 [[/r 2d6 # poison]] poison damage, clumsy 2, and flat-footed (1 round)

Requirements The Aspis technician is wielding a piercing or slashing weapon and has a free hand;
Effect The Aspis technician applies a poison to the weapon.
The Aspis technician Interacts to draw a bomb, then Strikes with it.
This mobile collection of vials and chemicals can be used for simple alchemical tasks.
description.label: Description

description.value: This tincture lets you pinpoint your foes. For the next 5 minutes, your alchemical bomb Strikes reduce the circumstance bonus to AC your targets gain from cover. Reduce your targets’ circumstance bonus by 1.
description.label: Description

description.value: Enzymatic compounds in this elixir strengthen and excite the muscles in your legs. You gain a status bonus to your Speed for the listed duration. The bonus is +10 feet, and the duration is 10 minutes.
description.label: Description

description.value:
This venom erodes its target’s defenses, aiding the spider in securing prey.

Saving Throw DC 21 Fortitude; Maximum Duration 6 rounds; Stage 1 1d10 poison damage and flat-footed (1 round); Stage 2 1d12 poison damage, clumsy 1, and flat-footed (1 round); Stage 3 2d6 poison damage, clumsy 2, and flat-footed (1 round)

Activate D Interact
description.label: Description

description.value: The rapier is a long and thin piercing blade with a basket hilt. It is prized among many as a dueling weapon.
description.label: Description

description.value: This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.
description.label: Description

description.value:
An antidote protects you against toxins. Upon drinking an antidote, you gain an item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against poisons for 6 hours.

You gain a +2 item bonus.

Activate A Interact
description.label: Description

description.value:
This flask filled with corrosive acid deals 1 acid damage, the listed persistent acid damage, and the listed acid splash damage. Many types grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 2d6 persistent acid damage and 2 acid splash damage. 

Activate A Strike
description.label: Description

description.value: Elixirs of life accelerate the body’s natural healing processes and immune system. Upon drinking this elixir, you regain the listed number of Hit Points and gain an item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for 10 minutes. The elixir restores 3d6+6 Hit Points and the bonus is +1.
description.label: Description

description.value: The Aspis technician deals an extra [[/r 2d6 # precision]] precision damage to flat-footed creatures.
